```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

## Plotly assignment

This is an assignment to create a web page presentation using R Markdown that features a plot created with Plotly


- first a graph using plot
- second a graph using ggplot2

## create Plot: diamonds data

```{r diamonds, echo=FALSE, message = FALSE}
diamonds <- filter(diamonds, clarity %in% c( "I1","IF","VS1"))
plot_ly(diamonds, x = ~carat, y = ~ price, mode = "markers", color = ~cut )
```

## Insect spray: boxplot of repellent and count of number of insect bites

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
p <- ggplot(InsectSprays,aes(x=spray,y=count,fill=spray))+
    geom_boxplot()+guides(fill=FALSE)
    (gg <- ggplotly(p))
```
